execution_quality: Adequate execution of the initial check command(s), though the brief nature and context-dependent nature of 'check again' makes full assessment difficult. The agent proceeded to attempt the subsequent email task.
work_category: System administration task involving re-checking something (likely server status, configuration, or service state) followed by a new request to send a test email.
summary: User requested a re-check of something unspecified, agent executed bash commands but context was insufficient for full alignment. User then pivoted to a new task (send test email), indicating the initial work either didn't meet expectations or was incomplete, and moved toward more concrete, specified work.
follow_up_pattern: User abandoned the initial task and pivoted to a new, more concrete task (sending test email), suggesting either the check was insufficient or the user moved on to more actionable work.
